title: Expected female brown eyes given independence

content.prompt: Ali surveyed 200 students at a school and recorded the eye color and the gender of each student. Of the 80 male students who were surveyed, 60 had brown eyes. If eye color and gender are independent, how many female students surveyed would be expected to have brown eyes?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

topic.text: 4.6: Independent Events and Unions of Events

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
